name: Discover Local Food
description: Explore culinary experiences such as cooking classes, food tours, and dining experiences hosted by local chefs or food enthusiasts.

name: Stay With Villagers
description: Immerse yourself in the local culture by staying with villagers in accommodations such as homestays, guesthouses, or eco-lodges.

name: Enjoy Local Festivals
description: Experience the vibrancy of local festivals, cultural events, and celebrations with music performances, traditional dances, and cultural activities.

name: Learn Local Dishes
description: Learn how to prepare local dishes and traditional recipes through cooking classes, culinary workshops, and hands-on experiences with local cooks.
